dashboard.title: StopSign AI - Business Intelligence & Traffic Analysis

targets.rawSql: SELECT sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count'])) as vehicles_today FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'yolo_inference' AND SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count'] != '' AND Timestamp >= today()

SELECT (countIf(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count']) = 0) * 100.0 / count()) as compliance_rate FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'stop_detection' AND SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count'] != '' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR

SELECT sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count'])) as violations_hour FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'stop_detection' AND SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count'] != '' AND toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count']) > 0 AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR

SELECT avg(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['cars.after_count'])) as avg_tracked FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'car_tracking' AND SpanAttributes['cars.after_count'] != '' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE

SELECT avg(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count']) / toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['detections.input_count'])) * 100 as detection_rate FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'car_tracking' AND SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count'] != '' AND SpanAttributes['detections.input_count'] != '' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR

SELECT avg(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['inference.duration_seconds'])) * 1000 as avg_inference_ms FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'yolo_inference' AND SpanAttributes['inference.duration_seconds'] != '' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR

SELECT toStartOfHour(Timestamp) as time, sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count'])) as vehicles_detected FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'yolo_inference' AND SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count'] != '' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfHour(Timestamp) as time, sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count'])) as violations, count() as total_events FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'stop_detection' AND SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count'] != '' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfHour(Timestamp) as time, avg(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['inference.duration_seconds'])) * 1000 as avg_inference_ms, quantile(0.95)(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['inference.duration_seconds'])) * 1000 as p95_inference_ms FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'yolo_inference' AND SpanAttributes['inference.duration_seconds'] != '' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfHour(Timestamp) as time, avg(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['cars.new_count'])) as new_cars_per_hour, avg(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['cars.after_count'])) as avg_tracked FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'car_tracking' AND SpanAttributes['cars.new_count'] != '' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT 'Today' as Period, count(DISTINCT toDate(Timestamp)) as Days, sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count'])) as Total_Vehicles, sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count'])) as Total_Violations, round((sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count'])) * 100.0 / sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count']))), 2) as Violation_Rate_Percent FROM otel_traces WHERE (SpanName = 'yolo_inference' OR SpanName = 'stop_detection') AND Timestamp >= today() UNION ALL SELECT 'Last 7 Days' as Period, count(DISTINCT toDate(Timestamp)) as Days, sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count'])) as Total_Vehicles, sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count'])) as Total_Violations, round((sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['violations.detected_count'])) * 100.0 / sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count']))), 2) as Violation_Rate_Percent FROM otel_traces WHERE (SpanName = 'yolo_inference' OR SpanName = 'stop_detection') AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY

SELECT toHour(Timestamp) as hour, toDayOfWeek(Timestamp) as day_of_week, sum(toFloat64OrNull(SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count'])) as vehicle_count FROM otel_traces WHERE SpanName = 'yolo_inference' AND SpanAttributes['objects.detected_count'] != '' AND Timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY GROUP BY hour, day_of_week ORDER BY day_of_week, hour
